scenario_text.value:
Where are you, Haru?! If you can hear me,
answer me!
He must’ve gone inside here...
Footsteps...? Haru, is that you?!
Aoi! I finally caught up to you!

Oh, Labramon?! What in the world are you
doing here...?

I came because I was worried about you,
of course!
I wouldn’t leave you on your own, no way!
Labramon... I’m sorry, I can be so selfish...
It’s okay...
Anyway, where’s Haru? Did you find him?
I lost sight of him once he came inside...

This building gives me the willies... The
enemy might be lurking around somewhere.

Well then we’d better search for Haru right
away!

We should go back, Aoi. Then we can come back
with the whole group!
No! I can’t do that!
Huh?!
I know that voice! But, it can’t be!
Aoi...

Saki! What... How is this possible?! Saki, is
that really you?!
Impossible...!

Oh... Oh, Saki...! You survived... Oh, I’m so
glad!
Wonderful... Truly wonderful...
...But no, dear Aoi. You’re wrong.

While I wanted to live longer, I am most
definitely dead.
...Huh?

I wanted to go home...but now I can’t. I’ll
never see my mom or dad again.
Tell me, Aoi... Why didn’t you save me?

I helped you time and time again, didn’t I?
So why? Why didn’t you help me?
Ah... I... S-Saki, I...
Why...?
I... I’m so sorry! It’s...it’s all my fault!
Tell me. Why did you let go of my hand?

Waaaaaaaaaaaaaaah! I’m sooorryyy! I’m sorry,
I’m sorry, I’m sooorryyy!!!

Yes, it was all your fault... And yet you
live! That hardly seems fair, now does it?

Why don’t you come with me, Aoi? What good is
it anyway, you being the only one to survive?

Saki... Yes. Yes, you’re right. I’ll follow
you...

It’s not fair...if I’m the only one who gets
to live...

Aoi! Snap out of it! There’s something very,
very wrong here!

Think about this for a second! Saki would
never do this!
Come on, Aoi... This way.

I’m so sorry, Saki... I’ll...be right
there...
So please...forgive me?
C’mon now... Over here... Hehe...
Sa-Saki...
Aoi! You can’t do this! Aoi!!!
